business_description: SanLei Trout produces high-quality rainbow trout in Lesotho, renowned as the 'roof of Africa.' Situated near Katse Dam, they cultivate trout under optimal conditions, adhering to sustainable aquaculture standards. Since 2018, SanLei has served local and international markets, aiming for ethical practices and responsible seafood sourcing while creating jobs in the local community.
transactions: SanLei began exporting trout to Japan in 2018 and to the USA in 2021.
